sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select>
        <option v-for="friend in friends" :key="friend">{{friend.name}}</option>
    </select>
    <button class="button" v-on:click="addFriend(friend)">Add friend</button>
</template>

<script>
import db from '@/fb';

export default{
    data(){
        return {
            friends: [],
            selectedFriend: ''
        }
    },
    emits: ['addFriend'],
    methods:{
        sortBy(prop){
            this.friends.sort((a,b) => a[prop] < b[prop] ? -1 : 1)
        },
        addFriend(){
            this.$emit('add-friend', this.selectedFriend)
        }
    },
    mounted(){
        db.collection('users').onSnapshot(res => {
            const changes = res.docChanges();
            changes.forEach(change => {
                if (change.type === 'added'){
                    this.friends.push({
                        ...change.doc.data(),
                        id: change.doc.id
                    })
                }
            })
        })
        console.log(this.friends)
    }
}
</script>

<style></style>
